column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Really good ramen but a little overpriced.  This is one of the better ramen places in Houston.  I have tried the Tonkatsu Black and the Cha Cha both were good.  The Tonkatsu Black is fantastic
column2: broth and noodles were good.  The Cha Cha has the thicker egg noodles which I was hesitant to try but ended up loving it.
